header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Internet companies, food/ water, holidays, computers/ updates, internet, accommodation, neighbours, slippers, bungalow, dvds,
header.activity: Father and daughter converse at home before dinner while looking for accommodation for holiday
header.conv_type: Dicsussing, explaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements
